summary: This enables headtracking functionality for a few of the default races that Bethesda forgot to activate.
descriptionHtml:
[color=red]!!Choose only one depending on if you have Dawnguard or not!![/color]

[heading][color=yellow]Details[/color][/heading]
Changes a few of the default races so the race itself allows headtracking which in turn enables all of the NPC\'s that use the race to headtrack and also enable the \"[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23600]Player Headtracking[/url]\" mod to work if you happen to play as one of those races.
These currently include these
-Dremora [i](already included into the USKP)[/i]
-Elder Vampires 
-High Elf Vampires [i](already included into the USKP)[/i]


[heading][color=yellow]Recommended[/color][/heading]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23600]Player Headtracking[/url] *As I actually made this to be able to use that with my High Elf.


[heading][color=yellow]Installation[/color][/heading]
Either use NMM to download and install or copy the Data folder into your Skyrim Installation and overwrite when asked.
Then activate the ESP either with NMM, the launcher or some other tool.


[heading][color=yellow]Uninstall[/color][/heading]
Deactive the mod with NMM or delete the esp from your Data folder.


[heading][color=yellow]Compatibility[/color][/heading]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9717]Better Vampires by Brehanin - v5.7[/url]


[heading][color=yellow]Incompatibility[/color][/heading]
Anything that edits these ID\'s (this should exclude stuff such as hairpacks):
-Dremora
-ElderRaceVampire
-HighElfRaceVampire


[heading][color=yellow]Known Bugs[/color][/heading]
None currently known


[heading][color=yellow]Credits[/color][/heading]
Thanks to Bethesda for creating the game and Creation Kit.
Thanks to Maegfaer for indirectly making me aware of this bug.


[heading][color=yellow]Tools Used[/color][/heading]
Creation Kit


[heading][color=yellow]Licensing/Legal[/color][/heading]
You can use the file however you like as it\'s just a tiny edit...
author: ErikRedbeard
